member.name: T:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Potentiometer
member.summary: A Potentiometer module for Microsoft .NET Gadgeteer

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Potentiometer.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.param: The mainboard socket that has the module plugged into it.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Potentiometer.ReadVoltage
member.summary: Gets the current voltage reading of the potentiometer.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Potentiometer.ReadProportion
member.summary: Gets the current position of the potentiometer between 0.0 and 1.0.
